sentence.Network_en: Calcium is excreted in the urine and stools.
sentence.Network_cn: 钙通过尿液和粪便排出体外。

sentence.Network_en: If you don't make your choice in time, you are likely to fall between two stools.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你不及时作出决定, 就会两头落空.

sentence.Network_en: Joanna was pouring the drink. While she was thus engaged, Charles sat on one of the bar-stools.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔安娜正在倒酒。就在她正忙的当儿，查尔斯坐在了一张酒吧凳子上。

entry.def: A stool is a seat with legs but no support for your arms or back.

example.ex: O'Brien sat on a bar stool and leaned his elbows on the counter.
example.tran: 奥布赖恩坐在一张吧凳上，胳膊肘靠在吧台上。

entry.def: If someone has fallen between two stools, they are unable to decide which of two courses of action to take and as a result they have not done either of them successfully.
Stools are the pieces of solid waste matter that are passed out of a person's body through their bowels.

auth_sentence.content: Other symptoms include dark coloured urine and pale stools.
